synopsis.text: Eagle City, Komerica - After 2,503 attempts, researchers at the WNA Research Laboratory finally succeed in developing "Ninja-Gum," a substance that activates latent Ninja DNA. Burton, Berecca, and Ron, descendants of legendary Ninja mercenaries, have tirelessly worked to formulate this mysterious gum. Upon producing a successful batch, Burton and Berecca excitedly try it themselves. But just as they begin to celebrate their breakthrough, an unexpected twist leaves them shocked. This anime follows the WNA team's groundbreaking efforts to reconnect with their Ninja ancestry through an experimental gum. Just as they unlock mystical powers tied to their lineage, new challenges and adventures await. Will mastering their newfound abilities help them continue their noble research or lead them astray?
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
